title: The External-Internal Group Quotient Structure for the Standard Model in Analogy to General Relativity
abstract: In analogy to the class structure $\GL(\R^4)/\O(1,3)$ for general relativity with a local Lorentz group as stabilizer and a basic tetrad field for the parametrization, a corresponding class structure $\GL(\C^2)/\U(2)$ is investigated for the standard model with a local hyperisospin group $\U(2)$. The lepton, quark, Higgs and gauge fields, used in the standard model, cannot be basic in a coset interpretation, they may to be taken as first order terms in a flat spacetime, particle oriented expansion of a basic field (as the analogue to the tetrad) and its products.
